name: Tailgate
storyline: One morning Hyde, a 9 years old labrador retriever, wakes up and realises that his Human, Derek, is gone. Hyde reluctantly leaves the house to investigate, only to find himself in the middle of an ancient dog prophecy. In order to find and save Derek he now has to uncover the mystery of the Tailgate. But he’s not going to face this alone — unlikely allies will come to help him as well as his superior dog senses and his sense of humour (albeit the doggo kind of humour).
summary:
Tailgate is a third-person narrative adventure about a dog.
Play as an aging labrador-retriever named Hyde. One day you wake up and realize that your human friend, Derek, is gone. Get out of the house, explore the desolate yet beautiful surroundings of the San Pedro village using the dog’s senses, solve problems, and puzzles the doggo-way. Search for hidden passages around obstacles and enemies, find long-lost balls that will remind you of precious moments, discover ancient dog lore, and finally go through the mysterious Tailgate to find and save your human.
